law.catch_line: Violation of law or failure to perform duty by member of board of elections.
law.text: Any member of the State Board of Elections or of a county board of elections who willfully and knowingly violates any provision of the statutes relating to his duties, or fails to execute faithfully any of the duties imposed upon him by law, for which no other penalty is provided, shall be guilty of a Class B misdemeanor.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 48, sec. 79, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 394, sec. 36, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 85.
